price: Na akaja mtu mbio kutokea upande wa mbali wa mjini, akasema: Enyi watu wangu! Wafuateni hawa walio tumwa.
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
footnotes: Akaja mtu kutoka huko mwisho wa mji akiwakimbilia wale wanamji, akawaambia: Wafuateni hawa walio tumwa kwenu na Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
